Articles.Content: Seriously when are they going to solve this issue with the freezing and crashing I've had this game since it started but havent gotten to play for 2 seconds.

Try alt-tab'ing out of the game right after you start it and see the first splash screen. Let the game start up in the background before alt-tab'bing back. I read that this workaround worked for many to stop crashing or freezing on the menu screen. 

Worth a try.
